name: SearchDatadogIssues
description:
Search and retrieve issues from Datadog using a query.

Use this tool to programmatically search for issues in your organization via Datadog. It returns a list of issues that match a specified search query, up to 100 per request.

parameters.name: start_date_millis
parameters.description: Start date (inclusive) of the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

value_schema.description: Start date (inclusive) of the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

parameters.name: search_event_query
parameters.description: Search query using the event search syntax to find relevant issues.

value_schema.description: Search query following the event search syntax.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date (exclusive) for the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch. Determines up to when the issues are retrieved.

value_schema.description: End date (exclusive) of the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

parameters.name: object_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of the object. The value must be 'search_request'.

parameters.name: include_relationship_objects
parameters.description: List of relationship objects to include in the response, specified as an array of strings.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of relationship objects that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: sort_results_by
parameters.description: Attribute to sort the search results. Options: TOTAL_COUNT, FIRST_SEEN, IMPACTED_SESSIONS, PRIORITY.

value_schema.description: The attribute to sort the search results by.

parameters.name: search_persona
parameters.description: Persona for the search. Choose from ALL, BROWSER, MOBILE, or BACKEND. Either track(s) or persona(s) must be specified.

value_schema.description: Persona for the search. Either track(s) or persona(s) must be specified.

parameters.name: event_track_to_query
parameters.description: Specify the track of events to query: 'trace', 'logs', or 'rum'. Either track or persona must be provided.

value_schema.description: Track of the events to query. Either track(s) or persona(s) must be specified.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of relationship objects that should be included in the response.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of relationship objects that should be included in the response.

parameters.name: data.attributes.from
parameters.description: Start date (inclusive) of the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

value_schema.description: Start date (inclusive) of the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

parameters.name: data.attributes.order_by
parameters.description: The attribute to sort the search results by.

value_schema.description: The attribute to sort the search results by.

parameters.name: data.attributes.persona
parameters.description: Persona for the search. Either track(s) or persona(s) must be specified.

value_schema.description: Persona for the search. Either track(s) or persona(s) must be specified.

parameters.name: data.attributes.query
parameters.description: Search query following the event search syntax.

value_schema.description: Search query following the event search syntax.

parameters.name: data.attributes.to
parameters.description: End date (exclusive) of the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

value_schema.description: End date (exclusive) of the query in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

parameters.name: data.attributes.track
parameters.description: Track of the events to query. Either track(s) or persona(s) must be specified.

value_schema.description: Track of the events to query. Either track(s) or persona(s) must be specified.
